ffmpeg_required: Tsarin `{{module_name}}` yana buƙatar **FFmpeg** don aiki. Da fatan za a shigar da shi daga gidan yanar gizon hukuma: - [https://ffmpeg.org](https://ffmpeg.org) Idan ba kwa buƙatar wannan fasalin, kuna iya kashe wannan ɓangaren a cikin sashin Shirye-shiryen Atomatik na **, ko ta danna maɓallin da ke ƙasa.
